ctsb.models package¶

core¶

Model

control¶

ctsb.models.control.ControlModel() Description: class for implementing algorithms with enforced modularity
ctsb.models.control.KalmanFilter() Description: Kalman Filter adjusts measurements of a signal based on prior states and knowledge of intrinsic equations of the system.
ctsb.models.control.ODEShootingMethod() Description: Implements the shooting method to solve second order boundary value problems with conditions y(0) = a and y(L) = b.
ctsb.models.control.LQR() Description: Computes optimal set of actions using the Linear Quadratic Regulator algorithm.
ctsb.models.control.MPPI() Description: Implements Model Predictive Path Integral Control to compute optimal control sequence.
ctsb.models.control.CartPoleNN() Description: Simple multi-layer perceptron policy, no internal state

time_series¶

ctsb.models.time_series.TimeSeriesModel() Description: class for implementing algorithms with enforced modularity
ctsb.models.time_series.AutoRegressor() Description: Implements the equivalent of an AR(p) model - predicts a linear combination of the previous p observed values in a time-series
ctsb.models.time_series.LastValue() Description: Predicts the last value in the time series, i.e.
ctsb.models.time_series.PredictZero() Description: Predicts the next value in the time series to be 0, i.e.
ctsb.models.time_series.ArmaOgd() Description: Implements the ARMA-OGD algorithm for time series prediction
ctsb.models.time_series.ArmaAdaGrad() Description: Implements the equivalent of an AR(p) model - predicts a linear combination of the previous p observed values in a time-series
ctsb.models.time_series.rnn.RNN() Description: Produces outputs from a randomly initialized recurrent neural network.
ctsb.models.time_series.lstm.LSTM() Description: Produces outputs from a randomly initialized LSTM neural network.
